name: cerb.data.records
description: A filterable, pageable list of a given record type
script:
inputs:
  text/record_type:
    type: record_type
    required@bool: yes
  text/filter:
    type: freeform
  text/query_required:
    type: freeform
  text/page:
    type: number
    default@int: 0
  text/limit:
    type: number
    default@int: 0

start:
  data.query:
    output: results
    inputs:
      query@text:
        type: worklist.records
        of: {{inputs.record_type}}
        query.required: (
          {{inputs.query_required}}
          {% if inputs.limit %}limit: {{inputs.limit}}{% endif %}
        )
        {% if inputs.filter -%}
        query: (
          {{inputs.filter}}
        )
        {% endif -%}
        {% if inputs.limit and inputs.page -%}
        page: {{inputs.page}}
        {% endif -%}
        format: dictionaries
    on_success:
      return:
        data@key: results:data
        paging@key: results:_:paging
    on_error:
      error:
        message@key: results:error
